data.title: Harry S. Truman
data.meta_description: Burial Place Location Significance Forest Hill Cemetery 6901 Troost Avenue
data.text:
Museum Hours

The Truman Library recently completed a massive renovation of the museum and its exhibitions, the first major renovation in more than 20 years and the largest since the museum opened its doors in 1957.

View our museum hours here.

The Harry S. Truman Library and Museum is part of the Presidential Libraries system administered by the National Archives and Records Administration, a federal agency.
